sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import { Button, Stack } from '@mui/material';
import { Container } from '@mui/material';
import Checkbox from '@mui/material/Checkbox';
import Box from '@mui/material/Box';
import Divider from '@mui/material/Divider';
import Typography from '@mui/material/Typography';
import FormControlLabel from '@mui/material/FormControlLabel';
import Grid2 from '@mui/material/Unstable_Grid2/Grid2';
import { Field } from 'formik';

const Step1 = ({ prevStep, nextStep }) => {
    return (
        <Container>
            <Typography variant="h4" gutterBottom>
                Tick the boxes below only if you are doing the following:
                1. Delivering working, tested software every 3 weeks or less, that means having something done
                2. Delivering what the business needs most, that means having something valuable done
                3. Process is continuously improving, that means having something improved
            </Typography>
            <Divider />
            <Box>
                <Stack spacing={2}>
                    <Field type="checkbox" name="frequency">
                        <FormControlLabel
                            control={
                                <Checkbox
                                    name="frequency"
                                    id="frequency"
                                    color="primary" // You can customize the color
                                />
                            }
                            label="Delivering working, tested software every 4 weeks or less." />
                    </Field>
                    <Field type="checkbox" name="business">
                        <FormControlLabel
                            control={
                                <Checkbox
                                    name="business"
                                    id="business"
                                    color="primary" // You can customize the color
                                />
                            }
                            label="Delivering what the business needs most."
                        />
                    </Field>
                    <Field type="checkbox" name="process">
                        <FormControlLabel
                            control={
                                <Checkbox
                                    name="process"
                                    id="process"
                                    color="primary" // You can customize the color
                                />
                            }
                            label="Process is continuously improving."
                        />
                    </Field>
                </Stack>
            </Box>
            <Box sx={{ bgcolor: 'paper' }}>
                <Grid2 container spacing={8}>
                    <Grid2 item xs={6}>
                        <Button variant="contained" color="primary" type="button" onClick={prevStep}>
                            Previous Step
                        </Button>
                    </Grid2>
                    <Grid2 item xs={6}>
                        <Button variant="contained" color="primary" type="button" onClick={nextStep}>
                            Next Step
                        </Button>
                    </Grid2>
                </Grid2>
            </Box>
        </Container>
    );
};

export default Step1;
